title: [聊天|管理]NukeChat V2.0.0 —— 别类死亡信息[1.7.2]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 98753 于 2014-1-31 20:11 编辑 

这款插件可以管理服务器的死亡信息
比如我被火烧死了
就会显示，“我被火烧死了”...



那么这款插件这么厉害，怎么使用呢？


既然你诚心诚意的问了！


那我就大发慈悲的告诉你吧？


恩恩




配置
= = = = = = = = = =[聊天格式]= = = = = = = = = =nukechat.chat ——聊天的许可。true为可聊天，其他为不可聊天nukechat.chat.color ——允许字体用颜色

= = = = = = = = = =【自定义频道】= = = = = = = = = =nukechat.customcommand.join——允许加入所有频道。nukechat.customcommand.leave.all ——允许玩家将所有频道。

= = = = = = = = = =【加入/退出消息】= = = = = = = = = =nukechat.message.all——允许有加入/退出游戏的消息。

= = = = = = = = = =【死亡消息】= = = = = = = = = =

nukechat.death - 是否显示死亡信息（全部）nukechat.death.blaze - 是否显示死亡信息（火）nukechat.death.magmacube - 是否显示死亡信息（岩浆）nukechat.death.skeleton - 是否显示死亡信息（骷髅）nukechat.death.cavespider - 是否显示死亡信息（洞穴蜘蛛）nukechat.death.spider - Permission to recieve Spider type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（蜘蛛）nukechat.death.zombie - Permission to recieve Zombie type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（僵尸）nukechat.death.slime - Permission to recieve Slime type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（史莱姆）nukechat.death.wither - Permission to recieve Wither type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（溺水）nukechat.death.witherskeleton - Permission to recieve Wither Skeleton type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（凋零骷髅）nukechat.death.witch - Permission to recieve Witch type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（女巫）nukechat.death.bat - Permission to recieve Bat type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（蝙蝠）（我想没人会因这个死掉吧？）nukechat.death.ghast - Permission to recieve Ghast type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（可怕的力量？）nukechat.death.silverfish - Permission to recieve Silverfish type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（蠕虫）nukechat.death.wolf - Permission to recieve Wolf type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（狼）nukechat.death.enderman - Permission to recieve Enderman type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（魔影人）nukechat.death.pigzombie - Permission to recieve Pigzombie type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息 （猪人）nukechat.death.enderdragon - Permission to recieve EnderDragon type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（苦力怕）nukechat.death.irongolem - Permission to recieve Iron Golem type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（铁傀儡）nukechat.death.blockexplosion - Permission to recieve Block Explosion type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息 （爆炸）nukechat.death.drowning - Permission to recieve Drowning type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（溺水）nukechat.death.fall - Permission to recieve Fall type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（摔死）nukechat.death.fallingblock - Permission to recieve Falling Block type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（矿车）nukechat.death.fire - Permission to recieve Fire type death message.- 是否显示死亡信息（火）nukechat.death.firetick - Permission to recieve Fire Tick type death message.nukechat.death.lava - Permission to recieve Lava type death message.nukechat.death.lightning - Permission to recieve Lightning type death message.nukechat.death.magic - Permission to recieve Magic type death message.nukechat.death.melting - Permission to recieve Melting type death message.nukechat.death.poison - Permission to recieve Poison type death message.nukechat.death.projectile - Permission to recieve Projectile type death message.nukechat.death.starvation - Permission to recieve Starvation type death message.nukechat.death.suffocation - Permission to recieve Suffocation type death message.nukechat.death.suicide - Permission to recieve Suicide type death message.nukechat.death.thorns - Permission to recieve Thorns type death message.nukechat.death.void - Permission to recieve Void type death message.nukechat.death.other - Permission to recieve Other type death message.

为什么有的没有中文呢？因为作者懒..




[groupid=542]没宝插件搬运小组[/groupid]

replies.author: 哭泣的格桑花
replies.txt_content: 目前用不到服务器的插件~

为什么我自踩呢？
因为我太懒...

replies.author: Notme.
replies.txt_content: 有1.6.2的  你更新下 谢谢

replies.author: Tikn
replies.txt_content: 不错啊 就是没有162的？

replies.author: i逗比
replies.txt_content: 怎么换成中文呢，死亡提示

replies.author: qjsd
replies.txt_content: 自定义怪物的名字能显示吗
